LanguageData.CRIALactationSettings.settings: RJW - C0ffee's RJW Ideology Addons - Lactation
LanguageData.CRIALactation.massageCooldownDesc: Default 0.3. Time between massages to stimulate lacation. 1 = A full day. Changing this number will not update existing cooldown Hediffs, it will only apply to new cooldown hediffs applied.
LanguageData.CRIALactation.totalMassagesUntilLactatio: Default 20. How many massages are required before lacation starts. Progress is saved as 0->1. Each time a massage happens the amount 1/total is added. Changing this value will not reset the current progress amount.
LanguageData.CRIALactation.hucowBreastSizeBonusDesc: Default 0.5. When turned into a hucow, this amount will get added to pawns existing breast size.
LanguageData.CRIALactation.hucowBreastSizeMinimumDesc: Default 1.0. When turned into a hucow, this is the smallest that breasts will end up being.
